md:
giải nghĩa từ "capacity" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Capacity (noun)
	+ Meaning: The ability or power to do something.
	+ Vietnamese: Năng lực, khả năng
	+ Example: "She has a great capacity for learning new languages."
	+ Related words: ability, power, skill, talent

* Capacity (noun)
	+ Meaning: The maximum amount that something can hold or produce.
	+ Vietnamese: Sức chứa, công suất
	+ Example: "The stadium has a capacity of 50,000 seats."
	+ Related words: volume, size, quantity, limit

* Capacity (noun)
	+ Meaning: A person's role or position in a particular situation.
	+ Vietnamese: Vai trò, chức năng
	+ Example: "He acted in his capacity as a lawyer to advise his client."
	+ Related words: role, position, function, duty
html:
giải nghĩa từ "capacity" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Capacity (noun)

    • Meaning: The ability or power to do something.
    • Vietnamese: Năng lực, khả năng
    • Example: "She has a great capacity for learning new languages."
    • Related words: ability, power, skill, talent

  • Capacity (noun)

    • Meaning: The maximum amount that something can hold or produce.
    • Vietnamese: Sức chứa, công suất
    • Example: "The stadium has a capacity of 50,000 seats."
    • Related words: volume, size, quantity, limit

  • Capacity (noun)

    • Meaning: A person's role or position in a particular situation.
    • Vietnamese: Vai trò, chức năng
    • Example: "He acted in his capacity as a lawyer to advise his client."
    • Related words: role, position, function, duty
